title: What is wrong???!?!
body:
Today I went to play Classic game. The champion select was okay, but after the counting went to zero (it also says "Preparing...") there nofthing happened. Our team could talk in the chat, but the game didnt want to launch! So this happened to me 6th times in a row today. I have reseted the pc, switched the pc, but everytime, after a countdown, my game didnt wanted to start!
So plz tell me or help me what is Happening??! Is this happening to anyone else, or its just me? Now i cant play LoL {{item:3070}}  {{champion:32}} ...

replies.body: When joining and going through champion select, the server is grouping you and everyone all together.  If you are having a connection issue then you can lose sync and get left behind, which might be what's happening here.  Your best bet is to go over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide for the fix.  Dry those tears and me know if you have any questions!
